Junior Frontend Developer

Hi! My name is Vitaliy and I am open to new opportunities.I want to find an interesting projects. I have been working with Front End for a year now, constantly improving my skills gained at Infopulse University. It feels like I am ready for new challenges.I have experience working as part of a team and individually.I like to spend my free time on fishing, I am interested in active types of recreation.I will be glad to new cooperation!

Attending a conference on FrontEnd

According to Stack Overflow, JavaScript has been the most commonly used programming language for the last eight years. This language is very widely used, so more and more developers decide to improve their knowledge of JS and related technologies such as Angular, React, Vue.js, or Node.js by participating in events dedicated to those subjects.
